Translations.Text: He speak do ludia crib i mat rad dospely; he bol 1 z the righteous
Ona said Moj Lord ako mozem ja have syn when ziaden clovek touched mna? He said GOD thus creates whatever He wills. Do have anything robit He len says do Bol ' it bol
He teach him scripture wisdom Torah Gospel

mat rad posol Dieta Izrael ja pojdem ona znamenie z tvoj Lord -Ja create ona z il shape bird potom ja blow it it becomes zit bird GOD's odist. Ja restaurovat vision blind heal leprous ja revive dead GOD's odist! Ja tell ona co ona jestn co ona store tvoj domov. This bol proof ona if ona bol believers
Ja confirm previous scripture -Torah -Ja revoke certain zakaz impozantny upon ona. Ja pojdem ona sufficient proof z tvoj Lord Therefore ona observe GOD obey mna
GOD bol MOJ Lord TVOJ Lord ONA KULT Him alone This je na pravo chodnicek
When Jesus zmysel ich disbelief he said Kto bol moj supporters GOD disciples said My bol GOD's supporters; my verit v GOD bear svedok my bol submitters
